title: ...Ready For It?
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics:
[00:11.29] Knew he was a killer first time that I saw him
[00:14.53] Wonder how many girls he had loved and left haunted
[00:17.23] But if he's a ghost, then I can be a phantom
[00:20.29] Holdin' him for ransom
[00:22.29] Some, some boys are tryin' too hard
[00:24.70] He don't try at all, though
[00:26.30] Younger than my exes but he act like such a man, so
[00:29.36] I see nothing better, I keep him forever
[00:32.23] Like a vendetta-ta
[00:34.97] I-I-I see how this is gon' go
[00:38.62] Touch me and you'll never be alone
[00:40.95] I-Island breeze and lights down low
[00:44.25] No one has to know
[00:46.98] In the middle of the night, in my dreams
[00:52.57] You should see the things we do, baby (mmm)
[00:59.06] In the middle of the night, in my dreams
[01:04.28] I know I'm gonna be with you
[01:06.36] So I'll take my time
[01:10.93] Are you ready for it?
[01:13.91] 
[01:17.22] Knew I was a robber first time that he saw me
[01:20.46] Stealing hearts and running off and never saying sorry
[01:23.44] But if I'm a thief, then he can join the heist
[01:26.38] And we'll move to an island, and
[01:28.76] And he can be my jailer, Burton to this Taylor
[01:32.39] Every lover known in comparison is a failure
[01:35.33] I forget their names now, I'm so very tame now
[01:38.28] Never be the same now, now
[01:40.94] I-I-I see how this is gon' go (go)
[01:44.79] Touch me and you'll never be alone
[01:46.86] I-Island breeze and lights down low (low)
[01:50.04] No one has to know
[01:51.48] (No one has to know)
[01:52.78] In the middle of the night, in my dreams (eh)
[01:58.66] You should see the things we do (we do), baby
[02:04.87] In the middle of the night, in my dreams (my dreams)
[02:10.37] I know I'm gonna be with you
[02:12.46] So I'll take my time
[02:16.97] Are you ready for it?
[02:20.22] Oh, are you ready for it?
[02:24.09] Baby, let the games begin
[02:26.23] Let the games begin
[02:27.65] Let the games begin (now)
[02:30.05] Baby, let the games begin
[02:32.18] Let the games begin
[02:33.53] Let the games begin
[02:35.03] I-I-I see how this is gon' go
[02:38.65] Touch me and you'll never be alone
[02:41.00] I-Island breeze and lights down low
[02:44.19] No one has to know
[02:48.48] In the middle of the night, in my dreams (my dreams)
[02:53.82] You should see the things we do (we do), baby (baby, mmm, eh)
[03:00.34] In the middle of the night, in my dreams (my dreams)
[03:05.73] I know I'm gonna be with you
[03:07.91] So I take my time (eh)
[03:12.60] In the middle of the night
[03:13.61] Baby, let the games begin
[03:15.53] Let the games begin
[03:17.17] Let the games begin
[03:18.36] Are you ready for it?
[03:19.62] Baby, let the games begin
[03:21.52] Let the games begin
[03:23.18] Let the games begin
[03:24.50] Are you ready for it?
[03:25.81]
